column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////Went to Saturday brunch here
column2: and it was great overall. The mimosas were good (good ratio of bubbly and juice)
column3: and the bloody Mary's were solid. We had a totchos was an appetizer
column4: and they were delicious! I could have had them as a whole meal. I had the gluten-free pancakes
column5: and they were some of the best I've ever had. Eggs and bacon were good but not special. The waiter was fine
column6: and we had generally good service.
